rComments: Kidd is a great teacher. The class is hard because the subject of programming is naturally hard. But Kidd does is best to teach the class at a basic level and does a better job than most computer programming professors. The class requires a lot of time and effort but definitely a great class to take!

Hardest class I've ever taken!! Kidd is nice and I really like his lecture, but he goes over the simple things in lecture but his actual assignment takes up 20+ hours per week to figure out. Oh, and the book DOESN"T help. LOTS of typos in the book. Google is your only friend in the class.

Be prepared to spend a lot time in this class. He jumps to the next concept too quickly. Labs are difficult to understand. His lectures are a simplified version of what you will be doing. If you ask the right questions, he is helpful. He is a really nice guy but difficult teacher.

i'm sure he's a smart guy, but answering questions and clarifying methods were lacking.  this was my first programming class, so to me it was pretty difficult.  assignemnts took at least 20 hours a week and office hours did not help at all.  and i felt like you actually need some prior programming knowledge for this class.

This is my first programing class and it is the hardest class I have ever taken. Professor Kidd is a smart guy and I like his lectures. But his assignments takes up about 20 hours per week to do. Most of it comes from the fact that his directions on his assignments are very wordy and confusing. He is basically drowning you with informations.

Took him for BME 160 and 110. He is a smart guy but during office hours he doesn't answer your questions; he turns the Q around and asks you. Tests were difficult, but homework was very easy (almost always ~100% for each class). Gotta pray for a great TA though.

Brian is very knowledgeable and willing to help.  His lectures were clear and helpful but some of his tests and labs had a few details that I got hung up on.  The final project didn't have much direction but I suspect he graded it very lightly.
